title: In the bush [Greek Version]
brief_description: This film provides a view of some unique Australian birds and animals. In particular, the platypus, echidna, kangaroo and koala in natural surroundings. Commentary in Greek language only - no subtitles. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
